comment: The only problem I found is my son uses the noise cancellation as an excuse not to listen to me, so he doesn't have to do anything. ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜‚

name: Afsar Ahmed
comment: Bought these to replace an older pair I have had for a few years now. They sound great. I find they are not quiet as loud as my previous solos but the sound quality is the same. Verified they are authentic. Serial number on the right side can be registered with beats. All contents were included and box was sealed. Definitely legit!! Great purchase!!!.

name: Avijit Nandi
comment: The EOS R5 has a low light AF limit of EV-6, which means it can autofocus on subjects even in conditions as dark as the one shown in the image above. If I could not use the AF, I would have had to switch to manual focusing, which is more time consuming. Even better, the Face Detection and Eye Detection AF worked thanks to a significantly improved AF algorithm, making the shoot even smoother.

name: Jobayer Hossain Shuvo
comment: I do not know why there are so many bad reviews. I bought these to take to the gym since my airpods keep slipping or falling down and I wanted something comfortable to listen to music while working out. I was a bit skeptical buying these due to the many bad reviews vs the good ones. But i gave them a chance. I bought the NEW not USED-LIKE NEW and mines work perfectly. They came in their case with their charger. Sounds great and you can still hear a little bit outside. Easy to control and connects to your phones Bluetooth quickly! So far no problems yet. If you are in doubt to buy these or not. I say yes! Best purchase i have made on amazon!.
